tool.name: metfrag-cli-batch
tool.description: Run MetFrag with a given parameter set.
tool.command: echo "java -jar /usr/local/bin/MetFragCLI.jar \"`cat $inputfile` ResultsFile=$outputfile NumberThreads=1 $additionalparameters\""; java -jar /usr/local/bin/MetFragCLI.jar "`cat $inputfile` ResultsFile=$outputfile NumberThreads=1 $additionalparameters";

param.name: additionalparameters
param.label: Additional Parameters
param.help: Add additional parameters to the MetFrag command line. This can include e.g. access information for a local MetChem database instance.

tool.help: Run MetFrag with given MetFrag parameters.
